name: Arcade Angler
description:
Arcade Angler is a reflex fishing game about collecting flying fish! Catch as many fish as you can as they fly across the screen, test your reflexes with different fish and dangerous hazards, and unlock new fish as your score reaches new highs! Purchase fish skins, and try and earn the highest score you possibly can, in this casual, arcade game.

This game and all it's assets (excluding fonts) were created by Mikael Christodoulides

V.1 Completed on the 12/7/2020
